text: w'in khiftum 'alaa taediluu fi yatamaa alnisa' allaati taht 'aydikum bi'ana la tetwhn mhwrhn kghyrhn, fatrkwhn wa'ankihuu ma tab lakum min alnisa' min ghyrhn: athnatayn 'aw thlathana 'aw arbeana, fa'iina khshytm 'alaa taediluu baynahuna faktfu bwahdt, 'aw bima eindakum min al'ima'. dhlk aldhy shreth lakum fi alytymat walzwaj min wahidatan 'iilaa arbe, 'aw alaqtsar ealaa wahidatan 'aw malak alymyn, 'aqrab 'iilaa edm aljawr waltedy
